TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ArraySegment`1<T> extends System.ValueType implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList`1<!T>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Structure ArraySegment(Of T) Implements ICollection(Of T), IEnumerable(Of T), IList(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T), IReadOnlyList(Of T)

generic <typename T> public value class ArraySegment : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IList<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyList<T>
type ArraySegment<'T> = struct interface IList<'T> interface IReadOnlyList<'T> interface ICollection<'T> interface seq<'T> interface IEnumerable interface IReadOnlyCollection<'T>

span.span: The type of the elements in the array segment.

summary.span: 分隔一维数组的一部分。

span.span: Delimits a section of a one-dimensional array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks @no__t 为数组的包装器，该数组分隔数组中的一系列元素。 is a wrapper around an array that delimits a range of elements in that array. 多 实例可以引用相同的原始数组，并且可以重叠。Multiple instances can refer to the same original array and can overlap. 原始数组必须是一维的，并且必须具有从零开始的索引。The original array must be one-dimensional and must have zero-based indexing. > [!NOTE] > @no__t 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] 开始实现 @no__t 1 接口;在以前版本的 .NET Framework 中， 结构未实现此接口。 implements the interface starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; in previous versions of the .NET Framework, the structure did not implement this interface. 每当在不同的段中操作数组的元素时， 结构就很有用。The structure is useful whenever the elements of an array will be manipulated in distinct segments. 例如:For example: - 你可以将只表示数组一部分的 @no__t 0 对象作为参数传递给方法，而不是调用相对开销较高的方法，如 以传递数组部分的副本。You can pass an object that represents only a portion of an array as an argument to a method, rather than call a relatively expensive method like to pass a copy of a portion of an array. - 在多线程应用程序中，可以使用 结构使每个线程仅在数组的一个部分上操作。In a multithreaded app, you can use the structure to have each thread operate on only a portion of the array. - 对于基于任务的异步操作，可以使用 @no__t 0 对象来确保每个任务在数组的不同分段上运行。For task-based asynchronous operations, you can use an object to ensure that each task operates on a distinct segment of the array. 下面的示例将一个数组分成多个包含十个元素的单独段。The following example divides an array into individual segments with up to ten elements. 该段中的每个元素都乘以其段数。Each element in the segment is multiplied by its segment number. 结果显示，使用 @no__t 0 类以这种方式操作元素将更改其基础数组的值。The result shows that using the class to manipulate elements in this way changes the values of its underlying array. [!code-csharp[System.ArraySegment#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/CS/segmentexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ArraySegment#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/VB/segmentexample.vb#2)] 但请注意，尽管 结构可用于将一个数组划分为不同的段，但这些段并不完全相互独立。Note, however, that although the structure can be used to divide an array into distinct segments, the segments are not completely independent of one another. @No__t-0 属性返回整个原始数组，而不是数组的副本;因此，对 @no__t 的数组所返回的数组所做的更改将对原始数组进行。The property returns the entire original array, not a copy of the array; therefore, changes made to the array returned by the property are made to the original array. 如果不需要这样做，则应在数组的副本上执行操作，而不是对表示数组部分的 @no__t 0 对象执行操作。If this is undesirable, you should perform operations on a copy of the array, rather than an object that represents a portion of the array. @No__t-0 方法和相等和不相等运算符在比较两个 @no__t 1 对象时测试引用是否相等。The method and the equality and inequality operators test for reference equality when they compare two objects. 对于两个 @no__t 0 个要视为相等的对象，它们必须满足以下所有条件：For two objects to be considered equal, they must meet all of the following conditions: - 引用相同的数组。Reference the same array. - 从数组中的同一索引开始。Begin at the same index in the array. - 具有相同数量的元素。Have the same number of elements. 如果要在 对象中按索引检索某个元素，则必须将其强制转换为 @no__t 的对象，并使用 @no__t 的属性对其进行检索或修改。If you want to retrieve an element by its index in the object, you must cast it to an object and retrieve it or modify it by using the property. 下面的示例检索 对象中的元素，该元素分隔字符串数组的部分。The following example retrieves the element in an object that delimits a section of a string array. [!code-csharp[System.ArraySegment.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.arraysegment.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ArraySegment.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.arraysegment.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 结构传递到方法。The following code example passes an structure to a method. [!code-cpp[System.ArraySegment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/CPP/arraysegment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.ArraySegment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/CS/arraysegment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ArraySegment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/VB/arraysegment.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个 ，用于分隔 @no__t 的所有元素。This constructor creates an that delimits all the elements of `array`. 也就是说，@no__t 的 属性为0，其 属性为 `array` 的长度。That is, the property of the is 0 and its property is the length of `array`. 若要创建仅分隔数组部分的 ，请使用 @no__t 构造函数。To create an that delimits only part of an array, use the constructor. 原始数组必须是一维的，并且必须具有从零开始的索引。The original array must be one-dimensional and must have zero-based indexing. 多 实例可以引用相同的原始数组，并且可以重叠。Multiple instances can refer to the same original array and can overlap. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 结构传递到方法。The following code example passes an structure to a method.
